activities:
Infratects collects/uses/or has access to the following types of information:
Names and contact details for prospective clients.
Names, usernames and contact details for Support Contract clients and their systems users.
Names and contact details for employees of Infratects corporate divisions and corporate partners.
(Contact details may include any or all of the following: e-mail address, phone number(s), mailing address, time zone, company, job title.)
Depending on your relationship to us, we will use the gathered information for marketing purposes, and to provide the services and support, and communications related to those activities to our clients and corporate divisions or corporate partners.
eucountries: Finland, Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Names and contact details (e-mail address, phone number(s), mailing address, time zone, company, job title)
